yaml_str = yaml.dump(output, default_flow_style=False)
yaml_str = yaml_str.replace(': null', ':')
with open(dist_name + '/release.yaml', 'w') as f:
    f.write('%YAML 1.1\n')
    f.write('# ROS release file\n')
    f.write('# see REP 137: http://ros.org/reps/rep-0137.html\n')
    f.write('---\n')
    f.write(yaml_str)
